DOC.brief_title: The ENTERPRISE Study - Study Enterprise Self-Expanding Stent System
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center , prospective , non-randomized feasibility study include 30 subject . Subjects receive safety follow-up evaluation 30 day ( + two week ) efficacy follow-up evaluation 6 month ( + four week ) .
